module: Module-level comment: The altera_dcfifo_synchronizer_bundle enables bit-level synchronization of data across different clock domains. Utilizing a generate block, it instantiates a synchronizer for each bit of the input vector 'din', using identical clocks and resets. Each synchronizer stabilizes its respective bit to output on 'dout', ensuring safe, cross-domain data transfer with parameterizable width and synchronization depth.
